text: Brody Dalle (born Bree Joanna Alice Robinson on January 1, 1979) is an Australian singer and guitarist from Melbourne. She started The Distillers in 1998. Her first solo album was released on April 28, 2014. == Personal life == Dalle was married to Tim Armstrong from 1997 until they divorced in 2003. She married Josh Homme in 2007. She lives with him in California. == Other websites == *Official website Category:1979 births Category:Australian guitarists Category:Australian rock singers Category:Australian singer- songwriters Category:Musicians from Melbourne Category:Living people
title: Brody Dalle
